function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 due to stay-at-home orders","Impact":"Increased transmission of the virus","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict quarantine measures and telecommuting","Technologies":"Telecommuting tools and remote work technologies","People":"General public, employees, and students","Owner":"Government and employers"},{"Description":"Displacement of children and students from educational environments","Impact":"Disruption of learning and social development","Mitigation":"Remote learning and online educational resources","Technologies":"Online learning platforms and educational apps","People":"Children, students, and educators","Owner":"Schools, educational institutions, and parents"},{"Description":"High unemployment rates due to business restrictions","Impact":"Financial instability and economic hardship","Mitigation":"Economic relief measures and support for displaced workers","Technologies":"Online job search platforms and virtual job fairs","People":"Unemployed individuals and furloughed employees","Owner":"Government, employers, and job placement services"}]}
